1. Select a model by clicking on it or [find your model by applying a filter or searching for it](/guide/model-inventory/working-with-model-inventory.qmd#search-filter-and-sort-models).

1. In the left sidebar that appears for your model, click **Model Activity**.

The table in this page shows a record of all activities, including: 

- Actions performed on the project by users in your organization 
- Project updates generated by the {{< var vm_dev >}} (`API Client`)
